chapters.title: ■ Maintain Brightness While Adjusting Saturation
chapters.body: In the Hue / Saturation / Brightness filter, switching to Perceptual mode now lets you adjust saturation while keeping the original brightness.
chapters.imageCaption: Original / Perceptual Saturation -100 / Compatible Mode Saturation -100

chapters.title: ■ Create a Layer Merged from All Layers
chapters.body: Tap Add Merged Layer from the layer menu to insert a layer above the current one that contains a merge of all layers.

chapters.title: ■ Swipe Left on Layers to Delete
chapters.body: Swiping left on a layer or folder now reveals the Delete button.

chapters.title: ■ Show Tooltips
chapters.body: Hover Apple Pencil over a button to see a description (requires a device that supports hover).

chapters.title: ■ Improved Stability
chapters.body:
・Fixed hue values occasionally jumping in the color picker
・Undo / Redo availability now reflected in the button appearance
・Additional bug fixes
